entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 p.m. PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 3:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 13 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: SSE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 9:50 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 mm except 30 mm inland. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:50 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 9:50 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
